newsitem.title: ITALY: Olivetti looks for Solutions partner.
newsitem.headline: Olivetti looks for Solutions partner.

text.p: Italy's Olivetti said on Thursday that its Olivetti Solutions (Olsy) company was part of the group's core business and was not for sale, but Olivetti was looking for a partner for the company.

The group's chief executive Roberto Colaninno told an analysts' meeting that he did not want to lose control of the company, which was formerly called Systems and Services, but was interested in securing a strategic partner.
A strategic partner would help with two objectives -- help the globalisation for Solutions, and also assist the development of the offer of the company which had annual sales of 4.5 trillion lire.
